TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit VisualElement extends System.Object

Docs.summary: A visual element instance that Xamarin.Forms created on the iOS platform.

remarks.para: Developers use this type to set iOS-specific blur effects on visual elements.
